Vars.var_description: Indicates that the change dictionary should provide the new attribute value, if applicable.
Indicates that the change dictionary should contain the old attribute value, if applicable.
If specified, a notification should be sent to the observer immediately, before the observer registration method even returns.
Whether separate notifications should be sent to the observer before and after each change, instead of a single notification after the change.

class_description: These constants are passed to addObserver(_:forKeyPath:options:context:) and determine the values that are returned as part of the change dictionary passed to an observeValue(forKeyPath:of:change:context:). You can pass 0 if you require no change dictionary values.
